snippet.title: Forza Horizon 4 - Barrett Jackson Car Pack
snippet.description:
The Barrett-Jackson Car Pack for Forza Horizon 4 arrives on April 8. The pack features seven incredible vehicles, including:

- 1970 Chevrolet Chevelle Super Sport Barrett-Jackson Edition
- 1975 Ford Bronco Barrett-Jackson Edition
- 1932 Ford Custom Double Down
- 1932 Ford Roadster Hula Girl
- 1959 Plymouth Atomic Punk Bubbletop
- 1970 Plymouth Hemi Cuda Convertible
- 1963 Shelby Monaco King Cobra

The vehicles of the Barrett-Jackson Car Pack are a veritable “who’s who” of collectible automobiles from decades past. From the hand-built 1932 Ford Custom Double Down to the sleek, race-ready 1963 Shelby Monaco King Cobra, these cars have been desired by drivers around the world since their introduction and now is your chance to experience them in Forza Horizon 4.

The Barrett-Jackson Car Pack will be available for separate purchase and is included with the Forza Horizon 4 Car Pass.
